attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These men acted to protect their families and should be pardonned on the grounds of diminished responsibility. The law should have recognised the intense stress and adrenaline that these men were acting under and free them.

rejection.details: Sentencing is a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
